com.spacealarm
Class SpaceAlarmLocationListener

java.lang.Object
  com.spacealarm.SpaceAlarmLocationListener

public class SpaceAlarmLocationListener
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles checking the current location against the list of user locations. If a match is found the class will send a notification to the user.
